entry.title: Biography
entry.content:
Biography

Hello! This is LiangLu, a Ph.D candidate in traffic engineering at School Of Transportion and Logistics, SouthWest JiaoTong University, in chengdu city, working on connected vehicles and autonomous vehicles driving group led by Prof. fangfangzheng. My research focused on modeling the mixed traffic flow with both human drivers vehicles (HV) and autonomous vehicles (AV), estimating traffic state and optimaling traffic system by considering AV control strategies.

entry.title: Honors and Awards
entry.content:
Honors and Awards

1、China Post-Graduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling： The Second Prize,2018 and The Third Prize,2019

2、Pacemaker to Merit Student: 2018-2019

3、National Scholarship: Ministry of Education of china . Nov 2019

4、The Second Prize Scholarship: Academic scholarship of SWJTU . Nov 2018

5、The First Prize Scholarship: Academic scholarship of SWJTU . Nov 2019

6、TANG LIXIN Scholarship: Found by Mr. Tang, famous entrepreneur and philanthropist . Nov 2019

entry.title: RESUME
entry.content:
LiangLu
Ph.D candidate
SouthWest JiaoTong University
------
Biography
Hello! This is LiangLu, a PhD student in traffic engineering at School Of Transportion and Logistics, SouthWest JiaoTong University, in chengdu city, working on connected vehicles and autonomous vehicles driving group led by Prof. fangfangzheng and Prof. xiaoboliu. My research focused on modeling the mixed traffic flow with both human drivers vehicles (HV) and autonomous vehicles (AV), estimating traffic state and optimaling traffic system by considering AV control strategies.

Education
- B.E in School Of Transportion and Logistics，2018

Interests
- Programing
- Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS)
- Estimating traffic state
- Lagrangian Model

Honors and Awards
China Post-Graduate Mathematical Contest in Modeling
The Second Prize,2018 and The Third Prize,2019
Pacemaker to Merit Student
2018-2019
National Scholarship
Ministry of Education of china . Nov 2019
The Second Prize Scholarship
Academic scholarship of SWJTU . Nov 2018
The First Prize Scholarship
Academic scholarship of SWJTU . Nov 2019
TANG LIXIN Scholarship
Found by Mr. Tang, famous entrepreneur and philanthropist . Nov 2019

Publications
1、Zheng, F., Lu, L., Li, R., Liu, X., & Tang, Y. (2019). Traffic Oscillation using Stochastic Lagrangian Dynamics: Simulation and Mitigation via Control of Autonomous Vehicles. Transportation Research Record, 2673(7), 1-11.
2、Zheng, F. , Liu, C. , Liu, X. , Jabari, S. E. , & Lu, L. . (2020). Analyzing the impact of automated vehicles on uncertainty and stability of the mixed traffic flow. Transportation Research Part C Emerging Technologies,112, 203-219.
3、Multilane traffic flow model in Lagrangian coordinates. *FORUM ON INTEGRATED AND SUSTAINABLE TRANSPORTATION SYSTEMS*（IEEE conference, 2020）

Projects
Project 1. Reliable traffic estimation of urban road network       Jun 2018 - Jun 2019
Mian Working: Applied didi vehicle data correction to establish mathematical model using MATLAB, and developed an analogue simulation to road network trajectory

entry.title: Publications
entry.content:
Publications

1、(SCI) Zheng, F., Lu, L., Li, R., Liu, X., & Tang, Y. (2019). Traffic Oscillation using Stochastic Lagrangian Dynamics: Simulation and Mitigation via Control of Autonomous Vehicles. Transportation Research Record, 2673(7), 1-11.

2、(SCI) Zheng, F. , Liu, C. , Liu, X. , Jabari, S. E. , & Lu, L. . (2020). Analyzing the impact of automated vehicles on uncertainty and stability of the mixed traffic flow. Transportation Research Part C Emerging Technologies,112, 203-219.

3、(EI) Lu, L., Zheng, F., Liu, X., & Yuan, Y. (2020, November). A Lagrangian traffic flow model considering lane changing behavior: formulation and numerical implementation. In 2020 Forum on Integrated and Sustainable Transportation Systems (FISTS)* (pp. 142-148). IEEE.
